TEXT: Obsessed with the stars. NL Fully faithful in the occult.
NL You look to the stars.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some interesting ritual. NL As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sister,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
